technology: There were no technical difficulties experienced by the participant.
cur_neg_affect: The participant did not express any negative affect about the pandemic/masks/vaccine/boosters in the present.
past_neg_affect: The participant expressed some negative affect about the pandemic when recalling the past, mentioning missing out on extracurriculars.
communal_orientation: The participant engaged in conversation and asked questions, but did not give affirmations or seem entirely engaged.
engagement: The participant was engaged in the conversation and tried to keep it going, but not throwing themselves into the conversation.
defensiveness: The participant did not display any defensiveness in justifying their beliefs/perspective.

questions.transcript: Did you get any subsequent shots?

vaccine_importance: The participant stated that they are very big on getting vaccines and think they are super important to everyone's health.
booster_importance: The participant said they would consider getting a booster in the future, indicating a moderate level of importance.
cognitive_complexity: The participant demonstrated a moderate amount of cognitive complexity by considering different perspectives and analyzing their own experiences.
general_notes: The participant seemed to have a positive attitude and was willing to share their experiences.
